baseline_groups.claim_summary: The Breakthrough school-based gender-sensitization program improves adolescents gender-egalitarian attitudes (standardized gender index) at Endline 1.
baseline_groups.notes: Single baseline: cross-sectional OLS with baseline gender index, grade FE, district FE, school clustering. Coefficient 0.014 SD, p=0.42. Index simplified vs paper.

global_notes: 54 rows total. Winsorized/trimmed specs likely have coding errors (scale change). Some control progression specs are duplicates. Heterogeneity specs report main effects not interactions.
